channel.title: Burnout on Novemberde's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Burnout on Novemberde's Blog

item.title: Managing and Overcoming Burnout (feat. Mannerism, Slump)
item.description: The word “burnout” is being heard everywhere. It is being used as a reason for quitting a job, changing jobs, taking a vacation, and expressing difficulties in life. I think everyone has heard it at least once, and I believe you have thought about whether you are in a state of burnout or not. When I hear about burnout from others, I often feel a sense of sympathy, but I also feel helpless because there seems to be no way to help them.
